goal.en: The course aims to introduce synchrotron radiation, promote scientific applications using Synchrotron Radiation-based technology, and image processing using VB.NET and MabLab.
goal.ch: 介紹同步輻射光源的產生的原理、同步輻射光源在科學上的應用及結合VB.NET及MatLab進行同步輻射顯微影像處理

content.en:
“1. An Introduction to Synchrotron Radiation
2. The applications using synchrotron-based ultraviolet facility
3. Synchrotron-based experimental instrument control using VB.NET-RS-232
4. Synchrotron-based experimental instrument control using VB.NET-GPIB
5. Principle of projection X-ray microscope and transmission X-ray microscope
6. Synchrotron-based transmission X-ray microscopy and its applications
7. Synchrotron-based X-ray computed tomography formation, processing, and 3D imaging reconstruction using Python (I)
8. Synchrotron-based X-ray computed tomography formation, processing, and 3D imaging reconstruction using Python (II)
9. Synchrotron-based X-ray computed tomography formation, processing, and 3D imaging reconstruction using Python (III)
10. Synchrotron-based X-ray computed tomography formation, processing, and 3D imaging reconstruction using Python (IV)
11. Mid-term Exam
12. Advance 2D microscopic image processing with VB.NET (I)
13. Advance 2D microscopic image processing with VB.NET (II)
14. Advance 2D microscopic image processing with VB.NET (III)
15. 3D microscopic image processing using VB.NET (I)
16. 3D microscopic image processing using VB.NET (II)
17. 3D microscopic image processing using VB.NET (III)
18. Site Tour of National Synchrotron Radiation Research Center“
content.ch:
“1. 同步輻射簡介
2. 同步輻射真空紫外實驗設施與應用
3. VB.NET在同步輻射實驗儀器控制的應用-RS-232
4. VB.NET在同步輻射實驗儀器控制的應用-GPIB
5. 同步輻射投影式及傳透式X光顯微術
6. 同步輻射奈米穿透式X光顯微術及應用
7. 利用Python進行同步輻射X光三維斷層影像進階重建技術 (I)
8. 利用Python進行同步輻射X光三維斷層影像進階重建技術 (II)
9. 利用Python進行同步輻射X光三維斷層影像進階重建技術 (III)
10. 利用Python進行同步輻射X光三維斷層影像進階重建技術 (IV)
11. 期中考
12. 進階VB.NET二維顯微影像處理(I)
13. 進階VB.NET二維顯微影像處理(II)
14. 進階VB.NET二維顯微影像處理(III)
15. VB.NET三維顯微影像處理(I)
16. VB.NET三維顯微影像處理(II)
17. VB.NET三維顯微影像處理(III)
18. 參觀新竹國家同步輻射設施“
